div.div: This app is amazing dunno why people don't buy this

div.strong: Doesn't work just keep saying warming

div.div: Del it :(
You set a distance goal, once you start the run it will be off. This is the same for the $2.99 version.Please fix and I'll fix my review.... Oterwise, people out there - DON'T waste your money.
A few glitches occasionally but overall a very satisfying product for the money!

I loved this app and used it religiously after trying out a few other running apps that I didn't care for. Upon updating, the version I used no longer lets me save runs to keep track of my total distance and it doesn't tell me mph. I realize I can do the math myself to figure out how many mpm I run, but this is a huge disappointment in an app I really enjoyed using. The app interface is totally different than it used to be. I'm looking elsewhere to find the things I need in a running app and hopefully it will be reliable.

iOs 4.3iPhone 4GExcellent App!My New Running Partner!I run 3 miles every morning and now using this excellent app, I'll be able to:- Keep a history/log of my runs including time/distance.- Track my true speed/GPS on a local map via true built in GPS!- See how many calories I'm burning!I'm very happy with the performance of "GPS Running Watch"!Thank you so much for making it!

Love the brown background against the vibrant green distance readout! Cool and friendly user interface. I had to get the full version because I want to have the more in-depth stats that it offers. Like the fact that it shows the calories burned and the aspects it shows based on your personal profile you input into it! The best of it's kind that I've seen! Recommend you upgrade to the full version, though, there's more to get out of it!

Both the Computer and the Watch apps are fun and great for tracking how much you've run/biked. This app helps you with the former and youll really want to use it with the amount of extraordinary visuals in place. Good buy and I highly recommend it. :)

This app just works great for me when I'm running. I like the lock icon on top of the screen that allows me to monitor my performance while I'm running. Interface is user friendly and I like the brownish colour! The bad thing is in free version I can't read my full report, will consider go for full version when I need!

This is one of the best running trackers I’ve seen. Its interface is very intuitive and easy to use. The capability of storing and comparing the running history is great and allows you to track improvements. This is one of my favorite capabilities together with the possibility of exporting the workout records and maps.A really great free app.

GPS running watch free (lite version) is a simple and useful running app for me. In this lite version, it only gives me a simple running statistics after I stop it. There is no in-depth statistics available (graphs, export, etc). I like GPS running watch as it has a neat interface showing my total distance, total numbers of run as well as calories. In lite version, I can share my running result in facebook & twitter but I'm unable to export it. Btw, I already have the full version of this great running app. The reason I download this and drop my comment here is to let you guys know what features are missing between lite & full version. If you are serious about your running and want to know in-depth statistics of each running, I prefer you get the full version! It's really a good app! Have fun. :)

Along with the Cycle computer watch, this is also incredibly useful. It's great for tracking how much calories you lost, how far you ran in a session and has a good interface and it's also free. You can buy the full version which has more statistics and export option+ no ads. So to me, that seems pretty useful!One comment I would like to make is I would absolutely love it if you integrated the cycle computer and the running computer into one app. I would even pay for that. Please make it happen AppAnnex!

Great running app I've ever seen! I've tried others tracker apps in the AppStore but this one is more convenient to use. All works fine, very cool and simple interface so much pleasure to use this awesome Running app!

This app provides you with all the features of a standalone GPS device like speed, distance, time taken plus various additional features like calories burned, elevation and location. The stats are presented in form of various graphs (you need to pay a small fee for in-depth stats and graphs).You can also create your personalized profile and then share it with your friends via Facebook, Twitter or email. I would love to see some more themes being added as future update. Overall, a perfect little app for fitness enthusiasts.
I run using a couch to 5K app. But that app doesn't have gps. So this app works great to track my run. Nice and intuitive interface. Recommended.

Ever wanted to run and see your distance and time and calories burned, and did not want to spend your childs college fund on some electronic that breaks down if the batteries don't work? I have too and this application works splendidly and it amazes me. It's easy to use and not hard at all to figure out. If you downloaded their other application 'GPS Cycle Computer' this application is just like it, except aiming towards running instead of cycling. It has everything running related in it. It calculates how much calories are burned, the distance you ran and various others. My favorite is that it shows you the distance your ran on Google Maps. It shows you exactly where you have been and just amazes me everythime I use it.This application is very neat and every fitness fanatic should have it on their iPhones.I hope you enjoy the application, I know I did. :)

I normally use the Nike Running App, but after trying this one out, I found it a great free alternative to the Nike App. I love the many statistics that it provides specifically regarding health. Good job.

This is a good match for a runner like me. I love running everywhere. This will help me a lot on tracking my progress daily. Will help me a lot on my daily activities like sucker punching someone and then making a run for it, stealing from someone and making a run for it and cursing on a lot of people and making a run for it. Perfect companion for me. Thanks!

With few touches, you are ready to run with this app. This app is easy to use and straight to the point. The GPS locking is fast and accurate. There is a history feature that you can store which is great if you want to monitor your running progress. This app is capable of telling you what is your average speed , how long you run, your running pace and how much calories you burn. You can share your running progress to email , twitter or facebook. Overall, it is a great running app to have. If you want even more feature such as graph and detailed statistic, there is a full version available.
Very good App And it's free
A great app
Very good app
Me es de mucha utilidad, cuando voy a la escuela por mi hijo, ya puedo saver cuantas calorias quemo y la distancia que camino!
Works fine. I would prefer to have access to the data or a graph and the details of the information during the run

Sometimes you just want an easy app that just works. This is it !! Easy tracking, great map, love the info. I fore-go the social stuff and just use it for each run to track time/distance. Best I have found.
Love the GPS-so much cheaper and easier to use than my temperamental Garmin watch!
Very easy to use and has all the info I need
Love it & it's easy!
I'm thrilled that I didn't have to buy a GPS watch. This is fantastic.
Great
Doesn't measure distance correctly
Great app
I installed GPS Watch only yesterday and have already obtained useful data for time, distance, speed and track. Very easy to utilize. BRAVO!
Does exactly what you want. User interface is perfect.
Great app accurate and reliable.
Perfect
Ok. Lose GPS on occasion.
Very useful!
This app is great easy to use a must if your a runner
